message: Hi Bob, I'm selling this product for $175. I think it's a great deal considering its value. What do you think?
I appreciate the offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $120. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
Bob, $120 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $140.  This is a fair price considering the value of the product. What do you think?
I appreciate your willingness to come down to $140, but I'm still a bit short on budget. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle at $130?
